definitions.definition: ( transitive ) To cover with small, thin pieces of building material, with shingles .
( transitive ) To cut, as hair, so that the ends are evenly exposed all over the head, like shingles on a roof.
( transitive ) To increase the storage density of (a hard disk ) by writing tracks that partially overlap .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To cover with small, thin pieces of building material, with shingles .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To cut, as hair, so that the ends are evenly exposed all over the head, like shingles on a roof.
( transitive ) To increase the storage density of (a hard disk ) by writing tracks that partially overlap .

definitions.definition: To hammer and squeeze material in order to expel cinder and impurities from it, as in metallurgy .

main_definition: ( transitive , manufacturing ) To hammer and squeeze material in order to expel cinder and impurities from it, as in metallurgy .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To beat with a shingle.
